dove.util.struct.tree

Class Tree.TreeIter

  • java.lang.Object
    • dove.util.treelib.Tree.TreeIter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Iterator<Tree<T>>
    Enclosing class:
    Tree<T> 

    private final class Tree.TreeIter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Iterator<Tree<T>>
    this class provides an iterator to iterate over the nodes of this tree inorder

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Tree<T> currentNode
      the current node in the tree
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.util.Iterator<Tree<T>>> internalIterStack
      this list provides the current position in the tree
      private Tree<T> root
      the root of the tree that is iterated

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      TreeIter(Tree<T> root)

            throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
